Question: He has two children from his first marriage and has been married to Callista (Bisek) this person since 2000.
Hints: This person's later books take a large-scale policy focus, including Winning the Future, and the most recent, To Save America.
On July 11, this person met with senior Republican leadership to assess the situation.
In 1984, Jackie (Battley) this person told The Washington Post that the divorce was a "complete surprise" to her.
